title: Rocky Mountain National Park: Mosses List
body: Mosses List         Moss with stem and pointed capsules NPS Photo  This is an updated abstract of Hermannâ€™s (1987) list of mosses (Phylum Bryophyta, Class Musci) found in Rocky Mountain National Park, with the nomenclature brought up to date, references to collections made outside the Park boundaries deleted, and additions resulting from later collections (Weber, Vitt, Cooper, Rolston, etc.) The list was provided by Dr. William Weber, University of Colorado Professor Emeritus. Common names are from the USDA Plants Database.
